species.name: victini
descriptions: It creates an unlimited supply of energy inside its body, which it shares with those who touch it.
This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.

abilities.name: victory-star
abilities.effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.
